DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare efficacy safety T1210 versus Olopatadine eye drop topical treatment seasonal allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Tolerability T1210 Olopatadine Hydrochloride 0.1 % Treatment Seasonal Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Conjunctivitis allergic conjunctivitis Severe ocular allergy Vernal keratoconjunctivitis
